places_with_reviews.name: Bramhan wada

reviews.text: It's is one of the most beautiful thing I have ever seen , no wonder it is the hearth of hyderabad 😍

I was said it's a replica of tank bund
There is no truth in it don't visit with kids because you can only see garbage scattered everywhere
Hygiene -9 out of 10
Atmosphere 1 out of 10
Maintenance 1 out of 10

Allowing entire Secunderabads sewage to enter Hussain Sagar untreated has taken its toll, the stench for us staying around Himayathnagar Basheerbagh area is getting unbearable. However the bund driveway improvements are noteworthy.

Historical bund constructed over River musi for the provision of drinking water facility to people of hyderabad. Before construction of modern attractions of city, this was the famous spot for educational tourists. In the mornings and evenings it's the busiest centre of joggers and yoga practitioners. Can view a giant Lord Budha statue. On the bond various historical persons, legends statues inspire us..
Greatly a good initiation has taken role in Adilabad for new way to generate a royal look in Adilabad.Its pleasure for Adilabadi's for getting a tourist spot of attraction.
